 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָבָה‎</span> **verb** ==be thick, fat, gross== (Late Hebrew Pi\`el <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִבָּה‎</span> ***make thick***, and derivatives; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***swell up***, passive participle ***swollen, thick, dense, stupid***, and many derivatives; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be dense, stupid***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***dense foliage***; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be great*** [[BDB#Di|Di]]<sup>985</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִמָּתְנֵי אָבִי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָֽטֳנִּי ע‎</span> [[1Kgs.12.10|1Kgs 12:10]] ***my little finger is thicker*** (stouter) than, etc., = [[2Chr.10.10|2Chr 10:10]] ***be thick, gross***, of rebell. Israel under figure of highly fed beast, 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁמַנְתָּ עָבִיתָ כָּשִׂיתָ‎</span> [[Deut.32.15|Deut 32:15]]. 



 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָבוּר‎</span>] **noun** only in <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּעֲבוּר‎</span><sub>47</sub>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּעֲבֻר‎</span> ([[Gen.27.10|Gen 27:10]]; [[Gen.27.31|Gen 27:31]]), **preposition** and **conjunction** ***for the sake of on account of, in order that*** (perhaps originally ***for the produce or gain of***), suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּעֲבוּרִי‎</span> [[1Sam.23.10|1Sam 23:10]], etc.; — 

**1.** as **preposition:** 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** [[Gen.3.17|Gen 3:17]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ארורה האדמה בעבורך‎</span> ***for*** thy ***sake***, [[Gen.8.21|Gen 8:21]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בעבור האדם‎</span> ***for*** man's ***sake***, [[Gen.12.13|Gen 12:13]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְמַעַן יִיטַבלִֿי בַּעֲבוּרֵךְ‎</span>, v[[Gen.12.16|Gen 12:16]]; [[Gen.18.26|Gen 18:26]]; [[Gen.18.29|Gen 18:29]]; [[Gen.26.24|Gen 26:24]], [[Exod.9.16|Exod 9:16]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זֹאת‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> [[Exod.13.8|Exod 13:8]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> [[1Sam.12.22|1Sam 12:22]]; [[2Sam.5.12|2Sam 5:12]]; [[2Sam.6.12|2Sam 6:12]]; [[2Sam.7.21|2Sam 7:21]]; [[2Sam.9.1|2Sam 9:1]]; [[2Sam.9.7|2Sam 9:7]]; [[Amos.2.6|Amos 2:6]]; [[Amos.8.6|Amos 8:6]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַעֲלָ֑יִם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ואביון ב‎</span>, [[Mic.2.10|Mic 2:10]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎טָמְאָה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> ***on account of*** uncleanness, [[Ps.106.32|Ps 106:32]]; [[Ps.132.10|Ps 132:10]], etc.; [[2Sam.12.21|2Sam 12:21]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַיֶּלֶד חַי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> ***because of*** the child, (being) alive (= while he was alive), [[Jer.14.4|Jer 14:4]] **\*\***&lt; read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְעֹבְדֵי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָאֲדָמָה חַתּוּ‎</span> Duhm, compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ᵐ5‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָאֲדָמָה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חַ֫תָּה‎</span> ***on account of*** the ground, (which) is dismayed, [[Job.20.2|Job 20:2]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּבַעֲבוּר חוּשִׁי בִּי‎</span> read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זֹאת‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וב‎</span>, or <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּבַעֲבוּרָהּ‎</span>. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** followed by infinitive (compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְמַעַן‎</span>), ***in order to***, [[Exod.9.16|Exod 9:16]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַרְאֹתְךָ אֶתכֹּֿחִי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span>, [[1Sam.1.6|1Sam 1:6]]; [[2Sam.10.3|2Sam 10:3]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֲּקֹר‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אתהֿעיר‎</span>, [[2Sam.18.18|2Sam 18:18]]: so <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְבַעֲבוּר‎</span> [[Exod.20.20|Exod 20:20]]; [[2Sam.14.20|2Sam 14:20]]; [[2Sam.17.14|2Sam 17:14]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בעבור לְ‎</span> [[1Chr.19.3|1Chr 19:3]] (\|\| [[2Sam.10.3|2Sam 10:3]], no <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span>). 

**2.** as **conjunction** [[Gen.27.10|Gen 27:10]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲשֶׁר יְבָרֶכְךָ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span>; without <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אשׁר‎</span>, [[Gen.21.30|Gen 21:30]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְעֵדָה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּהְיֶה לִ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> ***in order that*** it may be a witness for me, [[Gen.27.4|Gen 27:4]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּבָרֶכְךָ נפשׁי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span>, v[[Gen.27.19|Gen 27:19]] v[[Gen.27.31|Gen 27:31]]; [[Gen.46.34|Gen 46:34]]; [[Exod.9.14|Exod 9:14]]; [[Exod.19.9|Exod 19:9]]; [[Exod.20.20|Exod 20:20]]; [[Ps.105.45|Ps 105:45]]. 



 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָבַת‎</span>] **verb Pi\`el** ==wind, weave== (compare derivatives); — ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְעַבְּתוּהָ‎</span> [[Mic.7.3|Mic 7:3]] ***and (so) they wind it (or weave it***; i.e. mischief); so [[BDB#Hi|Hi]] [[BDB#Che|Che]] [[BDB#GASm|GASm]], but dubious; [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] reads <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָבַט‎</span> = ***twist, prevert*** (compare [[Joel.2.7|Joel 2:7]], but see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עבט‎</span>), [[BDB#We|We]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְעַוְּתוּהָ‎</span> = ***id.***, compare [[BDB#Now|Now]] (?), [[BDB#Dr|Dr]].
